body_html: I'll write up a change soon to work around this issue. I'm not sure if a perfect solution is possible. It might be best if we just not allow single character run names. Or maybe only impose that behavior on Windows, or when backslashes are used.
body_text: I'll write up a change soon to work around this issue. I'm not sure if a perfect solution is possible. It might be best if we just not allow single character run names. Or maybe only impose that behavior on Windows, or when backslashes are used.
body: I'll write up a change soon to work around this issue. I'm not sure if a perfect solution is possible. It might be best if we just not allow single character run names. Or maybe only impose that behavior on Windows, or when backslashes are used.
